text: Prokopios Pavlopoulos, GColIH (, , born 10 July 1950), commonly shortened to Prokopis (Προκόπης), was the President of Greece, in office from 2015 to 2020. Pavlopoulos was a lawyer, university professor and politician, he was Minister for the Interior from 2004 to 2009. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Greece Category:Greek lawyers Category:Greek educators
title: Prokopis Pavlopoulos
